translations: n．看护人，保姆：负责照顾或监督他人的人，尤指照顾儿童或有特殊需求的人。
· The children were left with their minders while the parents went out.
孩子们在保姆的照顾下，父母外出了。

phrs.translation: 童书守护人理想主义者

sentences.sentence: When he made his first video, he had fled his furious minders.
sentences.translation: 当他录制第一部录像时，已经从狂暴的看守身边溜走了。

sentences.sentence: Over the next few hours, these two women become my fiercely protective minders.
sentences.translation: 在以后的几个小时里，两个女人成了我严厉的保护人。

sentences.sentence: Initially I was simply irritated by our minders who seemed to have no concept of the expectations of a television film crew.
sentences.translation: 起初我只是因为陪同人员的思维中，似乎没有我们电视台摄制组所期望的概念而感到恼火。
